newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Three killed as Philippine mine tunnel collapses.
newsitem.headline: Three killed as Philippine mine tunnel collapses.

text.p: Three miners were crushed to death and four injured when a mine tunnel in the southern Philippines collapsed in heavy rains, police said on Wednesday.
The men were digging for gold at the time of the accident, which occurred last weekend at a small-scale mining area in the mountain town of Prosperidad in Agusan del Sur province, police said.
Poor communications delayed transmission of official reports to Manila.
Officials say hundreds of people have died in recent years while panning for gold ore in hillside tunnels in the southern Mindanao region.
